Easy to install. I did like this. 

1. Closed down my Internet connection 
2. Exracted one om the rar files (seems as you only need one of them)
3. Clicked "Install Lightroom 3.exe" 
4. Now just go ahead and install like any other program. But make the choise of NOT doing update automatic but manuall instead and then don't ever do any update (or the Adobe site may detect that it's a pirate serial)
